siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
blogPost.body: We have created a motivating way for people to mix exercise and fun. It is a library of augmented reality games: Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, and Brick Breaker AR. Do pushups to play the games. Go play at playar.ai and earn your spot on the leaderboard!
blogPost.title: PlayAR - Augmented reality games to get you moving
blogPost.author: Anika Mehrotra

localize.description: 我们为人们创造了一种将运动和乐趣相结合的激励方式。这是一个增强现实游戏库。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯卧撑去玩游戏。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上赢得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增强现实游戏让你动起来

localize.description: 我們爲人們創造了一種將運動和樂趣相結合的激勵方式。這是一個增強現實遊戲庫。Flappy Bird AR, Pong AR, 和Brick Breaker AR. 做俯臥撐去玩遊戲。去playar.ai玩吧，在排行榜上贏得你的位置!
localize.tagline: 增強現實遊戲讓你動起來

previous.excerpt: Kbee transforms Google Drive folders into a searchable wiki for you, your team, or your customers.
previous.title: Kbee - Turn Google Drive into a wiki or help center

localize.description: Kbee为你，你的团队，或你的客户将Google Drive文件夹转化为一个可搜索的wiki。
localize.tagline: 将Google Drive变成wiki或帮助中心。

localize.description: Kbee爲你，你的團隊，或你的客戶將Google Drive文件夾轉化爲一個可搜索的wiki。
localize.tagline: 將Google Drive變成wiki或幫助中心。

next.excerpt: Karaoke with friends together on the web or in VR and bring a little laughter back to everyone's homes. The brand new quarantine pastime. Currently in Beta!
next.title: Karaoke Nite - Karaoke with friends together on the web or in VR

localize.description: 在网络上或VR中和朋友一起K歌，把欢声笑语带回大家的家中。全新的检疫消遣方式。目前正在测试中!
localize.tagline: 在网络上或VR中与朋友一起K歌。

localize.description: 在網絡上或VR中和朋友一起K歌，把歡聲笑語帶回大家的家中。全新的檢疫消遣方式。目前正在測試中!
localize.tagline: 在網絡上或VR中與朋友一起K歌。
